short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Reels and Short Videos from Facebook Feed and redirect Reels URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take back control of your Face-book experience!

Face-book Reels Control is a simple and effective Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience on Facebook. With this extension, you can:

✅ Hide Facebook Reels: Instantly remove Reels and Short Videos from your Facebook feed to declutter your timeline and focus on the content that matters to you.

✅ Redirect Reels URLs: Automatically redirect Reels URLs to Facebook's main page, preventing you from accidentally landing on distracting content.

Features:

- Toggle Reels hiding on and off with ease.
- Enable or disable automatic URL redirection.
- Lightweight and user-friendly design with seamless integration into your browser.
- Completely customizable settings saved locally for your convenience.

Who is it for?

Users looking to declutter their Facebook feed.
Anyone wanting to avoid distractions and improve productivity.
People who want a cleaner, more focused Facebook experience.
Privacy Note:
This extension does not collect or share any personal data. All settings are stored locally in your browser.

Get started today and enjoy a distraction-free Facebook experience with Facebook Reels Control!
